code: import{getMonthString}from"../constants/Month";import moment,{now}from"moment";export function getYears(){var plusYears=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var result=[];var currentYear=new Date().getFullYear();currentYear+=plusYears;for(var i=currentYear;i>=currentYear-99;i--){result.push({name:i,value:i});}return result;}export function getYearObject(year){return{name:year,value:year};}export function leapYear(year){return year%4===0&&year%100!==0||year%400===0;}export function getDateRangeString(monthFrom,yearFrom){var monthTo=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:undefined;var yearTo=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:undefined;var result=getMonthString(monthFrom)+" "+yearFrom;if(monthTo&&yearTo){result+=" - "+getMonthString(monthTo)+" "+yearTo;}return result;}export function stringToDate(date){return moment(date,"YYYY-MM-DD");}export function dateToString(date){var format=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"DD-MM-YYYY";return moment(date).format(format);}export function calculateAge(date){var format=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"DD-MM-YYYY";var age=moment().diff(date,"years");return age;}
